content.en: Efficient wavelet architectures: Researchers are exploring ways to design efficient architectures for the discrete wavelet transform, a mathematical technique used in image and video processing. Algorithms are being attributed to achieving faster computation time, lower power consumption, and reduced complexity in these architectures. The goal is to improve the performance and efficiency of wavelet transform algorithms, making them suitable for real-time applications and enabling high-quality image and video processing.
content.da: Effektive wavelet-arkitekturer: Forskere undersøger måder at designe effektive arkitekturer til den diskrete wavelet-transformation, en matematisk teknik brugt i billed- og videobehandling. Algoritmer tilskrives at opnå hurtigere beregningstid, lavere strømforbrug og reduceret kompleksitet i disse arkitekturer. Målet er at forbedre ydeevnen og effektiviteten af wavelet-transformationsalgoritmer, gøre dem egnede til realtidsapplikationer og muliggøre høj kvalitet i billed- og videobehandling.
